config.messageText:
Welcome to the Mesh Viewer of the "Irrlicht Engine"!. This program is able to load and display all 3D geometry and models the Irrlicht Engine can. Controls: Left mouse to rotate, right mouse to move, both buttons to zoom. Escape to Stop FPS Camera
Supported formats are: - Irrlicht scene and mesh formats (.irr, .irrmesh, .xml) - 3D Studio (.3ds) - Blitz3D (.b3d) - COLLADA 1.2/1.3 (.dae, .xml) - Cartography shop 4 (.csm) - DirectX (.x) - DeleD (.dmf) - Maya (.obj) - Milkshape (.ms3d) - My3D (.my3D) - OCT (.oct) - Ogre3d (.mesh) - Pulsar LMTools (.lmts) - Quake 3 levels (.bsp) - Quake 2 models (.md2) - Stanford Triangle (.ply) - Stereolithography format (.stl)
